data.title: Piers Gaveston, Earl of Cornwall, 1307-1312 : Politics and Patronage in the Reign of Edward II by Hamilton, J. S.: Fine Hard Cover (1988) First Edition.
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9780710813787 - First Edition. - Hard Cover - Wayne State University Press, Detroit, MI - 1988 - Condition: Fine - Fine - FINE HARDCOVER. 192 pages, black cloth with gold jacket. Boards and text in like new condition, crisp, clean and unread. Jacket likewise in almost new condition. An excellent copy from owner/seller's private collection. Size: 6 x 9" - Piers Gaveston, Earl of Cornwall, 1307-1312 : Politics and Patronage in the Reign of Edward II
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

Check or money order or Paypal accepted; will bill libraries;

All books guaranteed with 10 day return;

All book dust jacket covered with Brodart protectors.

Shipping: $3.50 postage for first book for book rate shipping, $1 for all subsequent books: $5.50 priority mail for most books.

Orders outside the U.S. billed at cost.

All Orders Shipped promptly.

Shipping Terms:

Orders ship within 2 business days. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
